<<<api>>>: Iterator.next()
<<<code>>>: 
Iterator<ImageReader> readers = ImageIO.getImageReadersByFormatName("JPEG");
ImageReader reader = readers.next();
<<<explanation>>>: The code snippet uses the Iterator.next() method to retrieve the next element from the Iterator. In this case, it is used to get the next available ImageReader for the JPEG format.
